entry.title: Toro - Instant Potato Flakes - 25 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toro
Type: FOOD
Price: 109.99

Toro - Instant Potato Flakes - 25 Kg

Whip up large batches of delicious mashed potatoes in no time with these instant potato flakes! Made from real potatoes that are cooked to perfection and dehydrated, these instant flakes deliver the made-from-scratch flavor your customers crave without all of the time-consuming prep work.

Use them to create creamy mashed potatoes to serve next to your signature entrees, or shape the prepared product into mouthwatering potato pancakes! No matter how you choose to use it, this product will save time in your busy kitchen while allowing you to offer a product customers will love. This supply will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs.

entry.title: Campbell's - Beef Broth - 900 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Campbell's
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Treat your customers to the rich and satisfying taste of beef broth!

A versatile addition to your kitchen, this broth is made from slow cooking beef for hours. This broth offers a comforting, home-style taste without sacrificing kitchen preparation time. Quickly and easily prepare flavorful entrees with this wholesome broth and provide great service at your school, restaurant, or diner!

Add Versatility and Flavor

Pour this beef broth over poultry for juicy, tender entrees or use as an ingredient to make soups. To create dishes that will keep your customers coming back for more, add this broth to pot pie fillings, pasta or potato dishes, casseroles, and more!

entry.title: Knorr - Professional Concentrated Liquid Beef Base - 946 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knorr
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

Knorr - Professional Concentrated Liquid Beef Base - 946 ml

 

  • Concentrated base instantly creates beef broths and stocks
  • Offers exceptional flavour, colour, and aroma
  • Liquid concentrate delivers better flavour and shorter prep times than paste bases
  • Contains no artificial flavours, colours, or preservatives
  • Knorr® Liquid Concentrated Bases deliver versatility, scratch-like cooking and exceptional flavour, colour and aroma—with shorter prep time and greater flexibility.
  • Deliver simple, clean food with ease. Knorr® Bases are reinvented by our chefs with your kitchen and your customers in mind.

Ingredients

Beef stock (water, concentrated beef stock), maltodextrin, salt, sugar, yeast extract, onion powder, beef extract, beef fat, natural flavour, dimethylpolysiloxane.

Nutrition Information

*% of Reference Intake of an average adult (8400kj/2000kcal)

Additives

  • No artificial preservatives
  • No artificial colours and flavours

entry.title: Knorr - Professional Liquid Hollandaise Sauce - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knorr
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

Knorr - Professional Liquid Hollandaise Sauce - 1 L

  • Ready-to-Use Hollandaise sauce saves you valuable time and labour costs
  • Can be held warm for up to four hours
  • Minimize waste and save you money
  • Ideal for banquets and catering

Description

Repertoire Ready-to-Use Hollandaise sauce saves you valuable time and labour costs; just heat and serve. Repertoire makes it easy to serve gourmet sauces where you may never have thought possible!

Ingredients

Modified palm and canola oils, water, enzyme modified liquid egg yolk, skim milk powder, liquid yolk, salt, sugar, lactic acid, xanthan gum, natural and artificial flavour, guar gum, yeast extract, corn and potato maltodextrin, dextrose, carob bean gum, whey powder. Contains: Egg, milk, wheat.
